If you're looking for a more light-hearted war film, then "The Good German" would be a good option. It's a funny and heartwarming film about an American military journalist who is drawn into a murder investigation in post-war Berlin.

If you're looking for a more epic war film, then "Kingdom of Heaven" would be a good choice. It's a visually stunning film about a Greek general who leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.
